wikipedia_page.main: John Kevin Paul Keegan (born 5 August 1981) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Scarborough. and Chester City F.C.

response: John Keegan (1934–2012) was a British military historian.
John Keegan may also refer to:
*John Keegan (politician) (1867–1941), Australian trade unionist and politician
